BU_name.description: The text to be displayed in the BU Name

BU_forcastAmnt.description: The amount to be displayed in the forcast amount

BU_directAmnt.description: The amount to be displayed in the direct amount

headingType.description: The heading level of the widget; h1-h3. Default is h1.

setText.description: Set the text value of the widget

parameters.name: newTextValue
parameters.description: The displayed angle of the gauge

onClick.description: Called when the user clicks the Box.
